pr_title: Add a Jaeger exporter which exports via the thrift-over-http format

timeline.author: dengliming
anuraaga

replies.bodyText: hmm. as you probably have guessed at this point, this was cribbed from the GRPC exporter. probably not. I'll fix it up.
replies.author: jkwatson

timeline.bodyText: Probably better to not set key instead of setting to empty string.
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: not sure what Jaeger wants here. copied this from GRPC, assuming that was correct, but it might not be.
replies.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: made it not set a null/missing status description. seems like the right answer. we can change it back if there is a problem.
replies.author: jkwatson

timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: yeah, I micros works correctly, even though I can't find any documentation about it. :)
replies.author: jkwatson

timeline.author: anuraaga

timeline.bodyText: Can't see where to add the send result to batchResults. lost batchResults.add(batchResult); ?
timeline.author: dengliming

replies.bodyText: That seems right - I would expect basically all unit tests to fail if not adding to the batchResults. @jkwatson know what could be up?
replies.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: it works because we never look at the result code in the tests! I'll fix it
replies.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: I'm also going to add this check to the other Jaeger exporter test. :)
replies.author: jkwatson

timeline.bodyText: Can you add some small unit tests for these trace utility change?
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: yes, good idea. I will do so.
replies.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: We should consider to move this class in an api extension, I don't think it should be part of the public API .
replies.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: I would like to do that, but I'd rather not make a verbatim copy of the BigendianEncoding class, since there are a bunch of fiddly bits in there that it would be better not to have duplicates of. Any thoughts on that?
replies.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: @bogdandrutu any ideas on how to tackle this? Should we follow-up with a separate issue/PR?
replies.author: jkwatson

timeline.bodyText: Another jaeger integration test 😮  Scared of the container startup issues (not related to this PR, just noting)
timeline.author: anuraaga

timeline.bodyText: Confused why use CharSequence here and String in the other place. We should be consistent.
timeline.author: bogdandrutu

timeline.message: Initial implementation of a jaeger thrift exporter.

add assertions about the results of the exports
and fix the code to make sure the results were included.
add some fuzzing tests for the id <-> long conversions
change SpanId interface to match the TraceId one.
